item.title: Need help with a simple yell command
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[code=java] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
String rank = “”;
String Message = playerCommand.substring(4);
if (c.playerRights == 0) {
rank = “[Player] [”+ c.playerName +"] : “;
}
if (c.playerRights == 1 && c.memberStatus == 1) {
rank = “[Mod] [”+ c.playerName +”] : “;
}
if (c.playerRights == 2 && c.memberStatus == 2) {
rank = “[Admin] [”+ c.playerName +”] : “;
}
if (c.playerRights == 3 && c.memberStatus == 2) {
rank = “[Owner] [”+ c.playerName +”] : “;
}
if (c.playerRights == 4 && c.memberStatus == 1) {
rank = “[Player] [”+ c.playerName +”] : “;
}
if (c.playerRights == 4) {
rank = “[Player] [”+ c.playerName +”] : “;
}
if (c.playerRights == 1) {
rank = “[Mod] [”+ c.playerName +”] : “;
}
if (c.playerRights == 2) {
rank = “[Admin] [”+ c.playerName +”] : “;
}
if (c.memberStatus == 1) {
rank = “[Donator] [”+ c.playerName +”] : “;
}
if (c.memberStatus == 3) {
rank = “[@red@Owner@bla@] [”+ c.playerName +”] : ";
}

		for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
			if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
				Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; 
				c2.sendMessage(rank+Message);
			}
		}
	}[/code]

Repeat after me: “Host Gusher is AMAZING”

Read full topic
